channel.title: Maurice Norris's Drum & Bass, Dubstep, Hip Hop and Lounge Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Maurice Norris's Mixtape Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Maurice Norris
channel.itunes:summary: Drum and bass, dubstep, hip hop, electro house / breaks and easy listening / lounge mixes. An eclectic style with scratching and turntablism elements. Visit www.mauricenorris.co.uk for full tracklists and disclaimer.
